composition.composition_notes: Atomic filtering block, composable with standard types

interface.description: Get standard error message for HTTP status code.

logic:
def get_standard_error_message(status_code: int) -> str:
    """Get standard error message for HTTP status code."""
    messages = {
        400: "Bad Request",
        401: "Unauthorized",
        402: "Payment Required",
        403: "Forbidden",
        404: "Not Found",
        405: "Method Not Allowed",
        406: "Not Acceptable",
        407: "Proxy Authentication Required",
        408: "Request Timeout",
        409: "Conflict",
        410: "Gone",
        411: "Length Required",
        412: "Precondition Failed",
        413: "Payload Too Large",
        414: "URI Too Long",
        415: "Unsupported Media Type",
        416: "Range Not Satisfiable",
        417: "Expectation Failed",
        418: "I'm a teapot",
        422: "Unprocessable Entity",
        423: "Locked",
        429: "Too Many Requests",
        500: "Internal Server Error",
        501: "Not Implemented",
        502: "Bad Gateway",
        503: "Service Unavailable",
        504: "Gateway Timeout"
    }
    return messages.get(status_code, "Unknown Error")

metadata.description: Get standard error message for HTTP status code.
metadata.intent: Get standard error message for HTTP status code.
metadata.name: get_standard_error_message
